  • Method Details

    • setRotation

      void setRotation(Vector2 point, float angle)
      Sets the rotation of all the other objects.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to rotate.
      angle - The angle to rotate the by.

    • drawLine

      void drawLine(Vector2 point1, Vector2 point2, Color color)
      Draws a line between two points
      Parameters:
      point1 - The first point of the line.
      point2 - The second point of the line.
      color - The color of the line.

    • drawRect

      void drawRect(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size, Color color, boolean filled)
      Draws a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the rectangle.
      size - The size of the rectangle.
      color - The color of the rectangle.
      filled - If true, the rectangle will be filled with the color. If false, it will be outlined.

    • drawRoundRect

      void drawRoundRect(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size, Color color, boolean filled, int arcWidth, int arcHeight)
      Draws a rounded rectangle.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the rectangle.
      size - The size of the rectangle
      color - The color of the rectangle
      filled - If true, the rectangle will be filled with the color. If false, it will be outlined.
      arcWidth - The width of the arc.
      arcHeight - The height of the arc.

    • drawOval

      void drawOval(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size, Color color, boolean filled)
      Draws an oval at the given position with the given size and color
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the oval.
      size - The size of the oval.
      color - The color of the shape.
      filled - If true, the oval will be filled with the color. If false, it will be an outline.

    • drawArc

      void drawArc(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size, Color color, boolean filled, int startAngle, int arcAngle)
      Draws an arc.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the arc.
      size - The size of the arc.
      color - The color of the arc.
      filled - If true, the arc will be filled with the color. If false, it will be outlined.
      startAngle - The angle at which the arc starts.
      arcAngle - The angle of the arc in degrees.

    • drawString

      void drawString(String str, Color color, Vector2 pos, Vector2 scale, String fontName)
      Draws a string of text to the screen.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to draw
      color - The color of the text
      pos - The position of the text.
      scale - The scale of the text.
      fontName - The name of the font you want to use.

    • drawTexture

      void drawTexture(Texture texture, Vector2 pos, Vector2 size)
      Draws a texture at a position with a size.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to draw.
      pos - The position of the texture.
      size - The size of the texture.

    • setFilter

      void setFilter(Filter filter)
      Sets the filter to use in the render.
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter to be applied to the window.

    • setFont

      void setFont(String font)
      Sets the font of the text
      Parameters:

      font - The font to use.
